boardgame.description: Updated and streamlined for a new generation of players, Agricola, the award-winning and highly acclaimed game by Uwe Rosenberg, features a revised rulebook and gameplay, along with wood pieces and components for up to four players._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The 17th Century Was Not an Easy Time to be a Farmer. A game for 1-4 players ages 12 and up; play time is 30 minutes per player. Amazing replay value. The Agricola base game is a revised edition of Uwe Rosenberg_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s celebrated classic. The game is designed for 1-4 players, features improved all-wood components and a card selection from the base game as well as its expansions, revised and updated for this edition. Players begin the game with two family members and can grow their families over the course of the game. This allows them more actions but remember you have to grow more food to feed your family as it grows! Feeding your family is a special kind of challenge and players will plant grain and vegetables while supplementing their food supply with sheep, wild boar and cattle. Guide your family to wealth, health and prosperity and you will win the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 22 - Agricola vs Caverna: The Cave Farmers
Episode 85- Mystic Vale and Capstone Games Hot Seat
The Good The Board and The Jerks That Went to GenCon: Episode 78 “GenCon Reviews”

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

***PRE-ORDER - Expected in stock Thursday 2nd June*** -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Ginger Games - Great Games, Great Service www.gingergames.co.uk Postage
We will post to the UK and Ireland (see www.gingergames.co.uk for postage cost to Ireland) Standard rate for the UK is £6.30 and items will usually be dispatched within 24 hours Returns policy
Our returns policy can be found at www.gingergames.co.uk

You are NOT buying a copy of the game, but rather a bag of 54 animeeples that exactly match what comes in the game (to make up for the shortfall you can experience in the new version at larger player counts). There are 21 sheep, 18 pigs, and 15 cows in the bag. The cow color may not match exactly (in my set it was close), but the pigs and sheep are an exact match. If you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want to run out of animeeples during the game, especially at higher player counts, these might be right for you. Shipping is free to the lower 48 states. Everybody else should ask first! I take paypal, bitcoin, gift certificates, and money orders. Just ask!
Reserved for user: Ebyl Includes: Carcassonne: Hunters and gatherers, as well as 2 Police Precinct promos.

Heavy box. Willing to meet up to save on postage (NW Lancashire). ***UK SHIPPING ONLY*** +£10.00 via Parcelforce Express 48 This is the revised Mayfair Games version and contains animeeples and is for 1-4 players The 17th Century Was Not an Easy Time to be a Farmer. Amazing replay value. The Agricola base game is a revised edition of Uwe Rosenberg_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s celebrated classic. The game features improved all-wood components and a card selection from the base game as well as its expansions, revised and updated for this edition. Players begin the game with two family members and can grow their families over the course of the game. This allows them more actions but remember you have to grow more food to feed your family as it grows! Feeding your family is a special kind of challenge and players will plant grain and vegetables while supplementing their food supply with sheep, wild boar and cattle. Guide your family to wealth, health and prosperity and you will win the game. Updated and streamlined for a new generation of players, Agricola, the award-winning and highly acclaimed game by Uwe Rosenberg, features a revised rulebook and gameplay, along with wood pieces and components for up to four players. A game for 1-4 players ages 12 and up; play time is 30 minutes per player. Brand: Mayfair Games Part number: MFG3515 INCLUDES Plano that fits in box with all other components.

You are NOT buying a copy of the game, but rather a bag of 54 animeeples that exactly match what comes in the game (to make up for the shortfall you can experience in the new version at larger player counts). There are 21 sheep, 18 pigs, and 15 cows in the bag. The cow color may not match exactly (in my set it was close), but the pigs and sheep are an exact match. If you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t want to run out of animeeples during the game, especially at higher player counts, these might be right for you. Shipping is free to the lower 48 states. Everybody else should ask first! I take paypal, bitcoin, gift certificates, and money orders. Just ask!
